name: Visual Novel Maker - VitaminX Collection vol. 1
detailed_description:
Warning

Note that the contents of this pack only may be used in projects as long as the following is true:

  • The material is used in non-commercial (free) games only.
  • The material is not used in any projects containing adult-only content.
  • The material is not used in any projects containing gore.
  • The material is not used in any projects that infringe upon copyright of any individual or company.
  • The material is used as-is, without any personal edits or modifications.


About the Game



The elite crew from「VitaminX」is ready to take center stage in your non-commercial Visual Novel projects!

From D3 Publishers comes a snazzy set of characters and backgrounds straight out of 「VitaminX」. Make your own story with the teacher and student team B6, with a large variety of character art and backgrounds. Whether you want to create just one more adventure for B6 or want to illustrate your own love story, VitaminX Collection vol. 1 is a must-have addition to your Visual Novel asset library.


■Characters■

[Student team B6]
・Tsubasa（真壁翼）、Hajime（草薙一）、Shun（七瀬瞬）、Kiyoharu（仙道清春）、Goro（風門寺悟郎）、Mizuki（斑目瑞希）
Summer Uniform
Winter Uniform
Summer Casual
Winter Casual
※Each comes with 9 expressions

・Tsubasa（真壁翼）
Model costume

・Hajime（草薙一）
Soccer

・Shun（七瀬瞬）
Band costume

・Kiyoharu（仙道清春）
Basketball

・Goro（風門寺悟郎）
Male Uniform

・Mizuki（斑目瑞希）
White Robe

[Heroine] ※Comes with 9 expressions
Suit
Casual

[Sub character]※Comes with 3 expressions
・Tomoya（永田智也）
Suit


■Backgrounds■


Includes:
  • VitaminX_10thAnniversary
  • VitaminX_Bakasailles
  • VitaminX_Ballroom
  • VitaminX_Classroom
  • VitaminX_ClassroomClassX
  • VitaminX_Dressingroom
  • VitaminX_Gym
  • VitaminX_Schoolentrance
  • VitaminX_Schoolyard
  • VitaminX_Shootingstudio
  • VitaminX_Street

※This content use is subject to the VitaminX Collection resource EULA, please check before use.
